% Log, real, per capita data.  See the appendix of 
% "Understanding Trend and Cycle in Asset Values: Reevaluating the Wealth Effect on Consumption" NBER WP #9848
% paper for a detailed data description.  The data are updated based on 
% "Consumption, Aggregate Wealth, and Expected Stock Returns" Journal of Finance, June 2001.
% 
% NOTE: 
%  
%  - The asset wealth variable in this file is measured at the END-OF-PERIOD, 
%  e.g. the observation in 1952Q4 is wealth as of December 31 1952.
%  
%  - The DLS procedure used to estimate the cointegration coefficients includes 8 leads and lags.
%  
%  - In 2003, the BEA undertook comprehensive revisions of all NIPA data series. This resulted in 
%    a number of changes of data classification and data measurement, see 
%    http://faculty.haas.berkeley.edu/lettau/data/Data_Revision_2003.txt for more details.
% 
%
